name: Pyramids
description:
Pyramids is a puzzle/platform game
where an explorer tries to get out of
the pyramids with his loot. The task
will not be easy. There are many
dangerous traps and monsters that
will put your dexterity and ingenuity
to the test. The explorer will have the
use of TNT and a gun but his best
friend will be his shovel which allows
him to create and destroy blocks.
These blocks can be used as stairs,
bridges, protections... The explorer
will venture through 54 challenging
3D levels, divided into 6 worlds.
